title: Sestrieres 1949
creator_credit: Oxford University Film Society and Hugh Wyn Griffith
brief_description: This film is a photographic impression of a skiing holiday taken by 300 British students. No text and musical accompaniament acts as a narrative to the images we see. Great footage of skiers and Italian Alps. Music by Christofer Shaw and photography by Michael Warne, Charles Carson.
